video_prompt: Young woman's hand lightly presses piano keys. Subtle shifts in facial expression. Dynamic light source brightens and dims behind her, casting an evolving orange shadow. Background colors subtly pulse and shift, enhancing the film noir atmosphere.
image_prompt: Anime-style half-body portrait of a young woman with short dark hair and striking orange eyes, seated at a piano. She wears an off-the-shoulder black dress. The image features strong contrasts and a limited color palette of black, white, red, and orange, with a dramatic back/side light creating vibrant orange shadows and highlights. The background is stylized with bold shapes and color blocking. Evokes a film noir or dramatic stage lighting aesthetic. Includes "AI 生成" and "c29" text elements.
refined_video_prompt: Her hand gracefully depresses piano keys, her expression subtly morphing. Behind her, a dynamic light rapidly brightens and dims, making an orange shadow continually evolve. Background hues subtly pulse and shift.
